name: Apple - iPhone 6s 64GB - Space Gray (Verizon Wireless)

A 4.7-inch Retina HD display with 3D Touch. 7000 series aluminum and stronger cover glass. An A9 chip with 64-bit desktop-class architecture. All new 12MP iSight camera with Live Photos. Touch ID. Faster LTE and Wi-Fi. Long battery life and iOS 9 and iCloud. All in a smooth, continuous unibody design.
microdata.description: A 4.7-inch Retina HD display with 3D Touch. 7000 series aluminum and stronger cover glass. An A9 chip with 64-bit desktop-class architecture. All new 12MP iSight camera with Live Photos. Touch ID. Faster LTE and Wi-Fi. Long battery life and iOS 9 and iCloud. All in a smooth, continuous unibody design.

reviews.name: great phone overall.
reviews.author: Mrcluv1
reviews.description: Purchased this phone for my son as a gift and he loves it. Camera is awesome and easy to use.

reviews.name: Good Phone
reviews.author: ant9tim
reviews.description: Easy to use phone, especially for someone upgrading to a smartphone

reviews.name: Its an iPhone - of course it is great
reviews.author: lancdec
reviews.description: Having had an iPhone since the 3gs I cannot imagine not having one. The extra memory is a great addition.

reviews.name: Great phone
reviews.author: Jason
reviews.description: Decided to upgrade my 5s and what a great upgrade. Phone is amazing and had a good price when I bought it. Great phone!

reviews.name: Great phone. Value for money.
reviews.author: Lovemytech
reviews.description: This is a great phone and I got it on sale which makes it even better. The size is better than the 5SE and it handles well. Much better battery life and the size trumps the other two by far.

reviews.name: Great phone!!
reviews.author: Eric36
reviews.description: I was trying to wait for the 7 but couldn't pass up the deal!!

reviews.name: Only phone I'll use.
reviews.author: driftboy
reviews.description: I really like this phone. The camera is really great!
reviews.reviews: Posted by: from: brentwood, tn on

reviews.name: Good phone
reviews.author: zamee
reviews.description: I love my new iPhone. There is an app for everything.

reviews.name: Outstanding Purchase
reviews.author: KeithHenry
reviews.description: I'm very old school, but this phone is the best!! Does it all for me. Was not sure in the start but after a little talking with the sales man and that was it. The help in my store is or was the best!!!

reviews.name: The best iPhone & Touch Screen
reviews.author: Silverbuell
reviews.description: Outstanding smartphone with excellent battery life and superb screen. The new touch sensitive screen has enhanced the users ability to view or open apps.
